mapper.select: SELECT CINFO_COINID as 'coinId', CINFO_COINNAME as 'coinname', CINFO_CHAT_ADDR as 'chatAddr', CINFO_VERSION as 'version' FROM TB_COINBOT_INFO WHERE CINFO_COINID <> #{coinId}

SELECT CINFO_COINID as 'coinId', CINFO_COINNAME as 'coinname', CINFO_CHAT_ADDR as 'chatAddr', CINFO_EX_PRICE as 'priceEx', CINFO_EX_NUMBER as 'numberEx', CINFO_EX_TARGET as 'targetEx', CINFO_VERSION as 'version', CINFO_ENABLED_COINONE as 'enabledCoinone', CINFO_ENABLED_BITHUMB as 'enabledBithumb', CINFO_ENABLED_UPBIT as 'enabledUpbit', CINFO_ENABLED_COINNEST as 'enabledCoinnest', CINFO_ENABLED_KORBIT as 'enabledKorbit', CINFO_ENABLED_BITFINEX as 'enabledBitfinex', CINFO_ENABLED_BITTREX as 'enabledBittrex', CINFO_ENABLED_POLONIEX as 'enabledPoloniex' FROM TB_COINBOT_INFO WHERE CINFO_COINID = #{coinId}
